titles.title: Teacher Training Expansion Act of 2004

To provide that the Secretary of Education may give preference, in the distribution of certain grants under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act, to local educational agencies and public or private nonprofit organizations that provide training to regular education personnel to meet the needs of children with disabilities.
Teacher Training Expansion Act of 2004

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Teacher Training Expansion Act of 2004 - Amends the Individuals With Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) to authorize the Secretary of Education, in selecting recipients for certain IDEA grants for personnel preparation, to give preference to local educational agencies and public or private nonprofit organizations that provide training to regular education personnel to: (1) meet the needs of children with disabilities in integrated settings; and (2) work in collaboration with special education personnel in integrated settings.
